ai.summary: A short, easy 4.3 km hiking route in the UK designed for beginners and families, offering a gentle trail and pleasant countryside views.
ai.terrain_summary: Primarily a well-maintained, flat to gently rolling trail with occasional muddy patches after rain; suitable for casual walkers and children.
ai.safety_notes: Wear sturdy footwear and stay on marked paths. Check the weather and daylight hours before you go. Carry water and a small snack, plus a basic first-aid kit. Let someone know your planned route and expected return time. Be mindful of mud and slippery sections after rain, and watch for other hikers, cyclists, or dogs.
recommended_gear: Light rain jacket and extra layer
Map, GPS device, or a charged smartphone with offline map
ai.best_seasons: Spring, summer, and autumn are ideal; the trail is usable year-round in the UK with proper clothing and waterproofs.

seo.title: Discovery Trail: Easy 4.3 km Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Discover the Discovery Trail, a gentle 4.3 km hike in the UK ideal for beginners and families. Easy terrain, scenic countryside, and reliable year-round access.
